item.description:
Im going wether anyone else is or not..

the trip is over when its over..i dont have a watch..

This is an area that i have not explored yet and will look at whatever interests me or whomever else wants to check out an area that has some hidden plant, animal, or surprizing adventure waiting to jump out of the bushes...

look it up for further info....

This area is ok for Recreational kayaks..

Getting there:

From I-95,
take exit #34
take a right and go south on rte 1 (Bridgeport Ave)
go south for about 0.5 mile
take a right onto Naugatuck Ave at the stoplight.
Go North on Naugatuck ave for about 0.3 mile
turn left onto the access road to the houseatonic river just before the I-95 overpass above you...

Toyota avalon with kayak trailer....

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Charles E. Wheeler Wildlife Management Area, Milford CT
